amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the President to include in a report to Congress information about taxation in the United States as it affects business.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record, to insert a new paragraph entitled Contents of Report Related to Barriers to Investment into the United States and specifies for inclusion in the report a detailed discussion of factors including the effective rate of taxation on entrepeneurs and businesess and other sources of capital in the U.S. as compared to other countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 228 (Roll no. 106).
